automation_yaml:
id: 'living_room_lights_80pct_evening'
alias: Living Room Lights 80% Between 6PM and 11PM
description: "Between 6:00 PM and 11:00 PM, set living room ceiling lights to 80% brightness"
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time
    at: '18:00:00'
conditions:
  - condition: time
    after: '18:00:00'
    before: '23:00:00'
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id:
        - light.hue_lr_back_left_ceiling
        - light.hue_color_downlight_1_4
        - light.hue_color_downlight_1
    data:
      brightness_pct: 80
